primary_features: Sliding wardrobe doors with patterned design

materials: Black bands appear to be metallic

colors: Off-white or cream with wavy patterns
visual_attributes.lighting: Natural lighting from a side source, creating a soft glow
visual_attributes.texture: Smooth panelled surface with a wavy patterned texture

indian_context.regional_style: Not specifically indicative of a regional style
traditional_elements: No traditional Indian elements like carved elements or jharokhas
modern_adaptations: Modern interpretation of Indian design principles with clean lines and patterned elements
indian_context.space_utilization: Efficient use of vertical space with a wardrobe dominating the wall
indian_context.cultural_significance: The design reflects an attempt to modernize traditional Indian design elements while maintaining a clean and contemporary aesthetic

ai_generated_tags.description: The space features a minimalist modern bedroom design with sliding wardrobe doors that incorporate a wavy patterned design and black horizontal bands, suggesting a contemporary take on traditional Indian design elements. The neutral color palette and smooth finishes contribute to a sleek and sophisticated look.

metadata.budget_indicator: Mid to high budget, given the use of patterned materials and metallic details
metadata.indian_specific: Modern adaptation of traditional Indian design motifs
